title: War of the Roses: The Reflection Gave it Away
description: Teresa caught her boyfriend doing something shady last Christmas and NOW she saw him doing something he shouldn't in the reflection of his window while they were on Zoom the other day.  What did she see in the reflection and does it mean that he 's cheating?
